definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: gather together as a brood (cf. Aram. [[דְּגַר]] heap together; so dgar Nasar.)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[דָּגׇר]] Je 17:11; 3 fs. [[דָּֽגְרָה]] Is 34:15—gather together into its shadow Is 34:15 (of [[קִפּׂז]], q.v.), [[דָּגׇר וְלאׁ יׇלָדָ]] Je 17:11 (of partridge; sim. of one getting riches unjustly).
